# Patrick Bartosik - Full Stack Developer Portfolio

## About
Patrick Bartosik is a Full Stack Developer based in Paris, France, specializing in React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, and Shopify Plus development.

## Services
- Web Development (React, Next.js, Angular)
- SaaS Development
- E-commerce (Shopify Plus, Prestashop migrations)
- Backend Development (Node.js, NestJS, AdonisJS)
- API Development (REST, GraphQL)

## Technologies
- Frontend: React, Next.js, Angular, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js, NestJS, AdonisJS, Express
- Database: MongoDB, Supabase, PostgreSQL
- E-commerce: Shopify Plus, Shopify Liquid
- Payment: Stripe, LemonSqueezy, Polar

- Website: https://patrick.bartosik.fr

- GitHub: https://github.com/GrandEmpereur

## Location
Paris, France (Remote work available worldwide)

## Experience
4+ years of professional development experience

## Languages
- French (Native)
- English (Professional)
- Polish (Native)
